title: Sci-Fi - Volume 2
description: 10 Space ambient themes for your galactic adventures, with multiple loops and shorter edits
longDescription:
Preview the collection:

  • Youtube


"Sci-Fi - Volume 2" is a collection of space ambient themes with evocative and deep sonic textures featuring multiple loops, shorter edits and stings.

This pack is produced by Luca Tomassini a composer with more than 20 years of expertise in music production with multiple TV, feature films and multimedia placements. 


  • Ignition: Full length (03:03), 4 Short edits, 6 Loops
  • High Tech Labs: Full length (02:53), 2 Short edits, 5 Loops
  • Deep Space Ambient: Full length (03:53), 2 Short edits, 6 Loops
  • Mission Briefing: Full length (01:56), 1 Short edit, 5 Loops
  • Floating On Bright Heaven: Full length (01:29), 1 Short edit, 3 Loops
  • Computers On The Moon: Full length (04:19), 3 Short edits, 9 Loops
  • Space Lullaby: Full length (03:46), 3 Short edits, 5 Loops
  • Melancholic Robots: Full length (01:51), 3 Short edits, 7 Loops
  • Exploring Extraterrestrial Surface: Full length (02:24), 2 Short edits, 4 Loops
  • Galaxy: Full length (03:09), 2 Short edits, 5 Loops



Take a look: Total Game Music Collection - 500 High Quality music themes ideal for any game!

Maybe you might be interested at "Sci-Fi - Volume 1" or Space Ambient
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  10 Full length tracks
  •  25 Short edits
  •  55 Loops

Number of Audio Wavs: 88

Number of Audio Cues: 88

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 1h 48m 28s

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: All


- Terms of Usage and Licensing Notes outside the game engine.

All packages by Frequently Asked Music are meant to be used within Unreal Engine. Please contact us at studio@frequentlyaskedmusic.com for further clearance in case you want to use a specific track for other purposes - YouTube videos, social marketing, promo.
